attributes.action: Stop the company Lyst selling dogs online.
attributes.background: so today a brand called Lyst, announced that they are selling puppies on their website, naming it the "canine collection" and calling them "accessories" and that they're a "must have for any outfit". dogs arent your accessories.

rejection.details:
The decision about whether to sell pets or not is a matter for Lyst, which is a private company.

You could try contacting Lyst directly to ask them to change their policy.

Or you could start a petition asking Parliament to pass a law restricting the sale of animals on the internet.
